name: Trello: full width labels with text
description: Have your labels span the full width of the card, to make them more prominent, or to use them as colored separators, etc. If a label has a name (defined by you), it will appear.
additional_info: Full width labels, with visible names (you need to name labels first, in order to make the name appear). Square corners, not rounded. Do you want full width labels, but without the text visible? Then try my other extension: Trello: full width labels (no text) . Or just don't set text to labels.
